high_descs: Walk towards the window across from you, and make a right before the wooden chair, then go to the desk on your left.
Pick up the book on the top shelf of the desk, to the left of the clock.
Turn to your left and go to the left end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the top, left side of the desk.
Walk to the wooden chair and turn right before it. Walk to the desk in the corner.
Pick up the brown book on the desk.
Go to the left side of the desk.
Turn on the light by the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the brown book and turn on the light by the desk.

high_descs: Pick up a notebook from the desk
Turn on the lamp on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up a notebook and turn on a lamp
